name: chat-app
description: A React Native chat app designed around the Gifted Chat UI. Using Google Firestore, users experience a real-time chat interface with offline capabilites. See the readme on Github for more details.

name: movie_api
description: A full stack API that was built using React. Clients can create and edit their profile, browse movies and their details, and add those movies to a list of favorites. Other tools used include JWT and Node.js (server side). Data is retrieved by querying a REST API that I created from scratch.

name: todo-app
description: This is a responsive todo list app built with Vue. Clients can add, edit, delete, and prioritize items to their todo list. This was achieved by implementing a Material Design UI that utilizes the Vue.Draggable package.

name: meetup-app
description: A React Meetup PWA that utilizes Moment and Recharts to provide an UI with clean data visualization, allowing clients to stay up to date on events in their area.
